ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then its explanation is Our concern.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The exposition of its meaning surely rests on Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then it will be for Us to explain it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall be responsible for its explanation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then indeed, to explain its details to you is upon Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then it is for Us to make it clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Again on Us (devolves) the explaining of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then Ours it is to explain it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then lo! upon Us (resteth) the explanation thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and then, it will be for Us to make its meaning clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thereafter verily upon us is is the expounding thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then, its exposition [also] lies with Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay more, it is for Us to explain it (and make it clear):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then it is for Us (Allah) to make it clear to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then upon Us is its explanation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:19] Then, it is for Us to explain it, by making you comprehend [it]: the connection between this verse and what preceded [it] is that those [verses before] imply turning away from God’s signs, whereas this one implies applying oneself to them by memorising them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then lo! upon Us (resteth) the explanation thereof) the explanation of the lawful and unlawful, the commands and prohibitions.
